posts.content:
HI,
EVERYONE

I AM SELLING MY SPLITSCREEN FOR OFFERS AROUND £19 ,000
BUT SOME SCAMMER IS TRYING TO SELL IT ON GUMTREE FOR £6,250 AND EBAY USING MY DETAILS

HE IS ASKING FOR MONEY TO BE SENT TO HIM DIRECT VAN AT DIFFRENT LOCATION POLICE INFORMED EBAY AND GUMTREE

ORIGINAL SELLER ON EBAY NOW CASH ON COLLECTION NO PRE PAYMENT

DO NOT SEND MONEY ...............

THANKS RICKY FOR YOUR ADVICE
WANTED YOU GUYS TO KNOW AS I AM STILL A MEMBER OF THIS ACE CLUB

JIM FROM POOLE DORSET
SCAMMER EMAIL AT LOUIESTEVENSON@LIVE.COM (BEWARE)
